There are more things in the woods than anyone suspects, and the swamps keep a few secrets of their own. TV producer Mickey O'Hara's career was destroyed when his attempt to discover the legendary backwoods demon, Muckman, was exposed as a pathetic fraud. As fate would have it, he's given one last chance to redeem himself. The creature appears big as life, chaos ensues, there is blood and dismemberment, but all is not as it seems.

A gang of young people calling themselves the Living Dead spend their days terrorizing the population of their small town. Motivated by a desire to be truer to their name, they make an agreement with the devil, who promises they will survive and gain eternal life if they kill themselves while firmly believing in his power. Following their leader, they commit suicide one after the other, but things don't necessarily turn out as expected.

When her daughter, Yeon-hee, details stories told to her by a new friend, Hee-soo believes this to be the end of her writer's block. She begins piecing together her new project based on these tales, giving her a new bestseller. Unfortunately, this is only the beginning of a much more sinister story, of which Hee-soo is the main character.

Based on HP Lovecraft's dark sci-fi classic, The Color Out of Space is the story of a man searching for his father and finding madness instead. Arkham, 1975: Jonathan Davis' father has disappeared. His tracks lead to Germany, to the...

Based on HP Lovecraft's dark sci-fi classic, The Color Out of Space is the story of a man searching for his father and finding madness instead. Arkham, 1975: Jonathan Davis' father has disappeared. His tracks lead to Germany, to the Swabian-Franconian Forest where he was stationed after the Second World War. Jonathan sets out to find him and bring him home, but deep in the woods he discovers a dark mystery from the past.

titles.title: Silence, Ca Tue! Aka. Silence We Are Shooting

descriptions.description: A director disgusted by the film industry, decides to shoot a feature film made from live scenes and without any financial support. He undertakes this project in order to denounce the film industry and to portray the difficulties of achieving a...

A director disgusted by the film industry, decides to shoot a feature film made from live scenes and without any financial support. He undertakes this project in order to denounce the film industry and to portray the difficulties of achieving a cinematographic project in Belgium. But when the rivalries between the cast members cause problems on set, their excesses and their frustrations will slowly lead the director to a surrealistic disaster.

A film exploring the real motivations behind America's "War on Drugs" following Tommy Chong's arrest for the terrible crime of selling bongs in 2003. Set against the back drop of the War on Drugs and its tangled web of legal issues, this film...

A film exploring the real motivations behind America's "War on Drugs" following Tommy Chong's arrest for the terrible crime of selling bongs in 2003. Set against the back drop of the War on Drugs and its tangled web of legal issues, this film examines the personal effects the ordeal had on Tommy, as well as the motivations and tactics of the politicized Justice Department under George W. Bush.

A docu-comedy about the fanatic following that's sprung up around the many UFO sightings and reported extra-terrestrial encounters in Roswell. Richard Kronfeld lives in Minnesota and has dreamed for years of traveling to Roswell, New Mexico to...

A docu-comedy about the fanatic following that's sprung up around the many UFO sightings and reported extra-terrestrial encounters in Roswell. Richard Kronfeld lives in Minnesota and has dreamed for years of traveling to Roswell, New Mexico to research alien abductions, and maybe even contact an alien intelligence himself. Crashing with a Roswell local who agrees to rent out his motor home, Kronfeld proceeds to spends his days interviewing hundreds of people and UFO witnesses in the area.

The Lovedolls are back and trashier than ever in this punk-soaked sequel to the 1984 cult classic about the rise and fall of an all-girl band. Join Patch, Kitty Karryall and newcomer Cheetah Axethrasher as the band claws its way back to the top....

The Lovedolls are back and trashier than ever in this punk-soaked sequel to the 1984 cult classic about the rise and fall of an all-girl band. Join Patch, Kitty Karryall and newcomer Cheetah Axethrasher as the band claws its way back to the top. With special guest appearances by Vicki Peterson (The Bangles), Jello Biafra (Dead Kennedys) & Sky Saxon (The Seeds) and major rocking by Redd Kross, Sonic Youth, Meat Puppets, Dead Kennedys, & more!

A highly acclaimed and award-winning docu-drama, "Budo: The Art of Killing" is a cult favorite of martial arts practitioners and fans alike. Doing away with the practiced choreography of cinema, this film exposes the raw power and discipline...

A highly acclaimed and award-winning docu-drama, "Budo: The Art of Killing" is a cult favorite of martial arts practitioners and fans alike. Doing away with the practiced choreography of cinema, this film exposes the raw power and discipline forged in Japan's toughest dojos. Highlighting the various techniques of "Budo" (Karate, Judo, Aikido, etc.), this action-packed film is a visual feast exploring the historical traditions, training, and techniques of this specialized martial art.

A sleepy little town will get more than it bargained for when satanic heavy metal band "Black Roses" comes through to raise hell literally! After making a deal with the Devil himself, the band's diabolical music possesses kids in the audience, turning them into blood-thirsty demons. The blood flows as they start killing their parents and causing chaos at their local high school, culminating in a fiery battle between man and ultimate evil. Features original songs from "Lizzie Borden"!

Sexual temptation, betrayal and a precipitous fall intertwine to frame the lush and hallucinogenic stories of an immortal temptress over three eras. The official submission for Oscar consideration from Latvia, this labyrinthine tale spins off...

Sexual temptation, betrayal and a precipitous fall intertwine to frame the lush and hallucinogenic stories of an immortal temptress over three eras. The official submission for Oscar consideration from Latvia, this labyrinthine tale spins off from the Talmudic myth of Lilith, the soulless demoness who was Adam's and spurned first mate. As her story moves through the ages, a string of susceptible suitors eager to feed her appetite, all fall prey to the original femme fatale.

Featuring explicit, unsimulated sexual scenes by pornographic actress Ovidie, this film frankly confronts issues of integrity, art, and, well, porn. Jacques Laurent made pornographic films in the 70's and '80's. His artistic ideas, born of the '60's counter-culture, had elevated the entire genre. Older and paunchier, he is now directing porn again. Jacques's artistry clashes with his financially-troubled producer's ideas about shooting hard-core sex.

Marie is relatively content with her life, yet she endangers the security and comfort of her static life for a lecherous affair with 50-year old African-American Bill. We follow Marie as she straddles these two worlds, each side carrying its own weight leaving physical and psychological scars...

Reiko Haruna, a prize-winning author suffering from writer's-block, moves to an isolated house in the countryside. One night she sees a man in a storage room transporting an ancient mummy. She finds out the man is an archaeologist securing his...

Reiko Haruna, a prize-winning author suffering from writer's-block, moves to an isolated house in the countryside. One night she sees a man in a storage room transporting an ancient mummy. She finds out the man is an archaeologist securing his latest discovery, and the two form a friendship. Reiko allows the man to hide the mummy in her house, but soon begins noticing strange things happening around the place. This is not helped by the appearance of a ghost who starts visiting her late at night.

Controversial since its release in 1999, Lies dives into the sadomasochistic euphoria depicted by first time actors, Lee Sang-hyun, a sculptor, and Kim Tae-hyun, fashion model. The two embark on a sexual odyssey toward the realms of obsession. No common love affair, theirs tests the limits of both body and mind. When young girl Grace Budd goes missing, Detective William King stops at nothing to bring Fish to justice, a search that last six years and forces King to come face to face with a deeply disturbed mind.

A young psychologist, enacting her own brand of violent justice, infiltrates the Yakuza to avenge a woman who committed suicide at a clinic after being brutally raped by the gang and injected with a drug called Angel Rain. The mysterious and gruesome murder of a millionaire's entire family grips the attention of the general public. When no clues can be uncovered, a crime reporter begins his own investigation, leading him to a beautiful and delicate lady. titles.title: Once Upon a Time in Dublin

descriptions.description: Set in a dark urban landscape, this is the violent story of two Polish-Irish brothers trying to come to terms with their brother's brutal murder. The story follows the terrible hallucinatory visions that haunt bare-knuckle fighter Jonnie, as he...

Set in a dark urban landscape, this is the violent story of two Polish-Irish brothers trying to come to terms with their brother's brutal murder. The story follows the terrible hallucinatory visions that haunt bare-knuckle fighter Jonnie, as he battles with his own demons and a personal investigation into those responsible for the killing. As all his close relationships begin to crumble about him, he plunges into a violent chain of events that inevitably lead to mayhem and murder.

Accused of crimes he did not commit, a lonely circus clown exacts his revenge on those who unjustly condemned him. The act sparks something inside of him which he cannot stop and now, years later, his inner-demons have truly surfaced. Part urban...

Accused of crimes he did not commit, a lonely circus clown exacts his revenge on those who unjustly condemned him. The act sparks something inside of him which he cannot stop and now, years later, his inner-demons have truly surfaced. Part urban legend, part tabloid sensationalism... he is now an unstoppable murderous juggernaut, fueled only by hate. Going to the circus will never be the same.

A handful of times a year, a website will appear online for a week promising the sickest content out there. Pray you never stumble upon it. A young man gets hooked on a website called "Death Tube," that broadcasts actual murders in real time. At...

A handful of times a year, a website will appear online for a week promising the sickest content out there. Pray you never stumble upon it. A young man gets hooked on a website called "Death Tube," that broadcasts actual murders in real time. At first he doesn't believe it is real, until he is sucked into the channel itself. The killing game is about to begin.

What's worse than a failed dinner party? Why, being framed for the murders of the guests who didn't show up, as Caesar is about to find out. Equal parts parody and homage, the film continues the rich tradition of the holiday slasher. With cult...

What's worse than a failed dinner party? Why, being framed for the murders of the guests who didn't show up, as Caesar is about to find out. Equal parts parody and homage, the film continues the rich tradition of the holiday slasher. With cult favorite scream queens Linnea Quigley and Brinke Stevens - as well as modern-day guardian of schlock, Lloyd Kaufman - "Deadly Xmas" is a proud example of a movie made with nothing more than passion, commitment, and gallons of fake blood.

A middle-aged hired gun named Print, obsessed with stirring style and poetry into his assassinations, faces complications with his latest assignment. When tasked with the killing of a brothel owner who mandates cruel abortions on his whores, Print must overcome two challenges: training a young understudy during the assignment, and possibly - having been told to pull off the killing "quick and dirty" - eschewing his usual, obsessively imaginative methods.

A behind the scenes look into zombie culture in the United States, and the obsession with sexy female zombies. What is it about zombie bimbos, or "zimbies", that are starting to gain the world's interest? Why are zombies now in mainstream culture...

With interviews from zombie master maker George Romero, cult filmmaker Lloyd Kaufman, and cult movie star Bruce Campbell, to ZomBcon 2010 and so much more.

Who will survive? The cheerleader? The slut? The nerd and his anatomically correct talking robot?

Inspired by the real story of a Korean serial killer, Missing is one woman's intense journey into the dark den of depravity. Hyeon-jeong ventures to a small countryside village in search of her missing sister. When she finally gets a lead and...

1 filmmaker's dream! Over 355 Shots composited by himself! Shot entirely on 1 camera for only $5,000! It took 15 days to film, but 2 years to finish! A pair of stoner buddies who keep themselves occupied by growing and smoking as much pot as...

1 filmmaker's dream! Over 355 Shots composited by himself! Shot entirely on 1 camera for only $5,000! It took 15 days to film, but 2 years to finish! A pair of stoner buddies who keep themselves occupied by growing and smoking as much pot as humanly possible discover that by using zombie brains as fertilizer, they are able to grow a strain of super potent weed. Now, in order for them maintain a constant surplus of pot they must become zombie hunters in this hilarious action comedy!

titles.title: Crowbar: The Killings of Wendell Graves

descriptions.description: CROWBAR is a thrilling slasher film in the vein of HALLOWEEN and PSYCHO that dives deep into the psyche of jealousy and hatred. When Alex and Veronica move to Coburg, they have no idea the fate that awaits them. When they discover they were lured...

CROWBAR is a thrilling slasher film in the vein of HALLOWEEN and PSYCHO that dives deep into the psyche of jealousy and hatred. When Alex and Veronica move to Coburg, they have no idea the fate that awaits them. When they discover they were lured to town by a sociopathic real estate agent, the couple set off on a race against time to uncover the horrifying secrets of their new home before its tragic past swallows them as it has so many before.

Once upon a time, a freak was born, then hidden for decades in a lonely cellar, deep within the countryside of rural Italy. His name was Monkey Boy. One day, having made it out of his cellar and into the outside world, he meets Agata, an autistic...

Once upon a time, a freak was born, then hidden for decades in a lonely cellar, deep within the countryside of rural Italy. His name was Monkey Boy. One day, having made it out of his cellar and into the outside world, he meets Agata, an autistic girl who appears to be the only person who Monkey Boy can communicate with and understand. In the darkness of the night, they share an adventure filled with strange discoveries and unhappy creatures called human beings.

descriptions.description: 25 years ago, the 666 Killer left a trail of corpses. When his thirst for blood is renewed, only the unsuspecting Jamie Anderson stands in his way. "By the Devil's Hands" explores the dark troubled world of the infamous 666 Killer and the last...

25 years ago, the 666 Killer left a trail of corpses. When his thirst for blood is renewed, only the unsuspecting Jamie Anderson stands in his way. "By the Devil's Hands" explores the dark troubled world of the infamous 666 Killer and the last hypnotic hours of his victims as he continues his campaign of carnage!

Karen was your average high school student... until the night evil invaded her life. She would soon be known as the lone survivor of a seven-day killing spree perpetrated by a seventeen year old boy the world would come to call "Basement Jack"....

Karen was your average high school student... until the night evil invaded her life. She would soon be known as the lone survivor of a seven-day killing spree perpetrated by a seventeen year old boy the world would come to call "Basement Jack". When Jack is set loose on the world once again, Karen must return to the place where it all began. Seven years ago, she barely survived her first encounter with Basement Jack - now he's back to finish the job!

A group of young women afflicted with a horrible disease resort to cannibalism. The gruesome second installment of the "Andrew Parkinson Trilogy." A group of young women have a terrible, degenerative illness which forces them to murder and feed...

A group of young women afflicted with a horrible disease resort to cannibalism. The gruesome second installment of the "Andrew Parkinson Trilogy." A group of young women have a terrible, degenerative illness which forces them to murder and feed on human flesh. As they adjust to this carnivorous existence, their only concerns are where to find human flesh and how to avoid a zombie hunter, until a newly infected girl arrives...

A haunting look into the world most famous occultist's journey from his death bed - from his devout Christian upbringing through his many aspirations, Aleister Crowley looks back on the many triumphs and pains of how he lived and loved.

A haunting look into the world most famous occultist's journey from his death bed - from his devout Christian upbringing through his many aspirations, Aleister Crowley looks back on the many triumphs and pains of how he lived and loved.

Four wealthy country club wives come to an empty mansion to bid on the diary of a deceased pool boy who they all had affairs with. Once there, a Goth spirit medium hired to scare them actually opens the door to the other realm and the ghost of...

Four wealthy country club wives come to an empty mansion to bid on the diary of a deceased pool boy who they all had affairs with. Once there, a Goth spirit medium hired to scare them actually opens the door to the other realm and the ghost of the deceased refuses to let anyone leave until he finishes playing all his cards.

Three tales of hair-bleaching terror illustrate the fates of some unfortunate souls, including a man who steals urns for money, a fortune teller running from evil ghosts, and two unusual women hiding a sinister relationship.

Three tales of hair-bleaching terror illustrate the fates of some unfortunate souls, including a man who steals urns for money, a fortune teller running from evil ghosts, and two unusual women hiding a sinister relationship.
Four kids wake up one morning in a mysterious abandoned field. As darkness covers the sky with no hope of light, they must face mysteries rooted deep in mankind's origin.
Four kids wake up one morning in a mysterious abandoned field. As darkness covers the sky with no hope of light, they must face mysteries rooted deep in mankind's origin.

It's CARRIE by way of THE WIZARD in this revenge flick about a bullied teen who gets his hands on a pair of gloves that grant him telekinetic powers. Every day, Alex contends with a malicious girlfriend, a nasty boss, and an abusive step-father....

It's CARRIE by way of THE WIZARD in this revenge flick about a bullied teen who gets his hands on a pair of gloves that grant him telekinetic powers. Every day, Alex contends with a malicious girlfriend, a nasty boss, and an abusive step-father. His life changes, when his friend, a brilliant scientist, invents a pair of psychokinetic gloves. When Alex accidentally kills the man in a struggle over the gloves, the teen finally snaps and goes on a revenge fueled spree against all who wronged him.
When aliens land on Earth to find a man with huge relational problems, the reaction caused by their arrival ranges from racism to bizarre mystic-religious interpretations.
When aliens land on Earth to find a man with huge relational problems, the reaction caused by their arrival ranges from racism to bizarre mystic-religious interpretations.

titles.title: Abducted by Aliens : UFO Encounters of the 4th Kind

descriptions.description: Using interviews with experts and first-hand witness accounts, this fearless doc explores the truth about mankind's contact with aliens. Countless individuals have very real memories of being taken secretly against their will by aliens. Are we...

Using interviews with experts and first-hand witness accounts, this fearless doc explores the truth about mankind's contact with aliens. Countless individuals have very real memories of being taken secretly against their will by aliens. Are we being taken by beings from outer space or another dimension? Just how deep does this conspiracy go and what do the government and military really know?

In response to the deadly accident on Soviet spaceship "Soyuz-11," the Soviet government conducted top-secret experiments... on people. Young men were subjected to unbearable tests, and survived. Today, they share their shocking story.

In response to the deadly accident on Soviet spaceship "Soyuz-11," the Soviet government conducted top-secret experiments... on people. Young men were subjected to unbearable tests, and survived. Today, they share their shocking story.

titles.title: Central State: Asylum for the Insane

descriptions.description: Join Dan T. Hall and his crew of experts - trained in psychology, the paranormal, and folklore - get the true story of what really happened behind the closed doors through interviews with past employees of the hospital, as well as with people who...

Join Dan T. Hall and his crew of experts - trained in psychology, the paranormal, and folklore - get the true story of what really happened behind the closed doors through interviews with past employees of the hospital, as well as with people who are ex-patients themselves.

Accompany your host, anthropologist and ceremonial magician Poke Runyon, as he takes you on a journey into the secret realms of Hermetic Yoga. Discover the secret rites, magical empowerments and powerful techniques of a magical tradition older...

Accompany your host, anthropologist and ceremonial magician Poke Runyon, as he takes you on a journey into the secret realms of Hermetic Yoga. Discover the secret rites, magical empowerments and powerful techniques of a magical tradition older than the Golden Dawn's Cypher Manuscript.

titles.title: The Murder of Mary Magdalene: Genocide of the Holy Bloodline

descriptions.description: Was Mary Magdalene murdered? Did the Catholic Church conspire to eradicate the Holy Bloodline from existence? The infamous Da Vinci Code has placed the notion that Mary Magdalene was the wife of Jesus into the popular arena, along with the idea...

Was Mary Magdalene murdered? Did the Catholic Church conspire to eradicate the Holy Bloodline from existence? The infamous Da Vinci Code has placed the notion that Mary Magdalene was the wife of Jesus into the popular arena, along with the idea of a Holy Bloodline descended them. In this unique film we journey to places never before researched in connection with this story.

Are the Freemasons a secret society? Or a society with secrets? What are their rituals all about? What does it look like inside a Lodge? This film takes you inside the Grand Lodge of England with unique footage of the various rooms, symbols and...

Are the Freemasons a secret society? Or a society with secrets? What are their rituals all about? What does it look like inside a Lodge? This film takes you inside the Grand Lodge of England with unique footage of the various rooms, symbols and tools of the Craft. Prepare for an unprecedented insight into the often mysterious world of the Freemasons. Whether you are a Freemason or a Conspiracy Theorist, this film will help you understand the role of the Freemasons in our society.

What is a Yeti? A being from a parallel world? A bio-robot spy from another planet? Anthropologists are convinced that the existence of a mammal corresponding to Yeti descriptions is physically impossible. Some say the Yeti can vanish into thin...

What is a Yeti? A being from a parallel world? A bio-robot spy from another planet? Anthropologists are convinced that the existence of a mammal corresponding to Yeti descriptions is physically impossible. Some say the Yeti can vanish into thin air, hypnotize people, and are unable to be photographed or videotaped. Many theories exist but this film presents those backed by sizeable evidence.

titles.title: New World Order: The Conspiracy to Rule Your Mind

descriptions.description: Explore a consortium that has developed worldwide to bring together its forces to influence the life of everyone. A documentrary chronicling the connection between media, academia, industry, military and political factions that have been used by...

Explore a consortium that has developed worldwide to bring together its forces to influence the life of everyone. A documentrary chronicling the connection between media, academia, industry, military and political factions that have been used by the ruling elite to establish the ability to influence the thoughts, decisions, and world view of human beings across the globe all under the guise of upholding democracy.

On the first night of a new job, Michael sees shadows prowling the halls. Things quickly escalate to a maelstrom of horror beyond comprehension. Soon, Michael becomes tangled in the web of a conspiracy dating back to the Roswell crash of 1947....

On the first night of a new job, Michael sees shadows prowling the halls. Things quickly escalate to a maelstrom of horror beyond comprehension. Soon, Michael becomes tangled in the web of a conspiracy dating back to the Roswell crash of 1947. When he discovers his boss has secretly kept a recovered alien all these years as retaliation for his own son's abduction, Michael must retrieve the alien baby or risk being abducted himself.

Four estranged siblings brought together by their inventor father's sudden death seek to uncover the true circumstances of his mysterious demise. Searching for clues regarding the secret experiment that drained the family fortune and ultimately...

Four estranged siblings brought together by their inventor father's sudden death seek to uncover the true circumstances of his mysterious demise. Searching for clues regarding the secret experiment that drained the family fortune and ultimately took their father's life, the adult children discover that if they can't overcome their differences and work together, both their father and favorite brother will be lost forever between two worlds. Written and directed by BAFTA winner Martin Gooch.

Elvis has been found alive - and working for the FBI! Will the Obama administration allow him to give up his second life as an undercover agent and go back to singing? A Freedom of Information Act request for FBI records on Elvis Presley reveals...

Elvis has been found alive - and working for the FBI! Will the Obama administration allow him to give up his second life as an undercover agent and go back to singing? A Freedom of Information Act request for FBI records on Elvis Presley reveals that the King is in fact still alive, and living in Simi Valley, California! Working undercover since the late 1960s, Elvis now wants to reclaim his life and restart his singing career. But will the Obama administration let him?

Six priests sent to a country estate to perform an exorcism begin to uncover demons of their own, as well as the dark secrets that haunt the estate. Trouble begins when a small box made of wood from Noah's Ark is revealed to make wishes come...

Six priests sent to a country estate to perform an exorcism begin to uncover demons of their own, as well as the dark secrets that haunt the estate. Trouble begins when a small box made of wood from Noah's Ark is revealed to make wishes come true. The catch? Once the wish is granted, the users' souls are trapped in the darkest corners of hell.

This film recreates the risky experiment Dr. Jara undertook with a group of schizophrenics in order to prove their illness had a paranormal origin. The mystery hidden in the youngest patient, Ainara, will change the course of events. Based on the...

This film recreates the risky experiment Dr. Jara undertook with a group of schizophrenics in order to prove their illness had a paranormal origin. The mystery hidden in the youngest patient, Ainara, will change the course of events. Based on the finding of the original video and audio tapes of the experiment in March 2006, the film shot in 2011 shows the unexpected occurrence of some chilling EVPs. A must see for the lovers of the paranormal, the mysterious and the suspenseful.

Anthropologist and Ceremonial Magician, Poke Runyon explains and demonstrates authentic techniques of ancient Ritual Magick. Learn how to invoke Angels and evoke Spirits to visible appearance. Stand in the Magick Circle with Masters of the Art as...

Anthropologist and Ceremonial Magician, Poke Runyon explains and demonstrates authentic techniques of ancient Ritual Magick. Learn how to invoke Angels and evoke Spirits to visible appearance. Stand in the Magick Circle with Masters of the Art as they conjure the Spirits of Bael and Astaroth in the Dark Mirror upon Solomon's Triangle. Discover the scientific truth and psychological validity behind our own culture's unique and powerful form of Shamanism.

titles.title: The Conspiracy to Rule the World: From 911 to the Illuminati

descriptions.description: Using a unique collection of evidence and theory, this film sets out to expose the new world order. The individuals in this film all share a common bond - they were awakened. They awoke to a world that was unfamiliar to them and one that was...

Using a unique collection of evidence and theory, this film sets out to expose the new world order. The individuals in this film all share a common bond - they were awakened. They awoke to a world that was unfamiliar to them and one that was often terrifying and bizarre. Suddenly those trusted men and women in power became manipulators and power hungry dictators and not the democratic leaders we are led to believe.

In 1908, villagers from a sparsely populated area of central Siberia, near the Tunguska River, witnessed a large glowing object streak across the sky. Suddenly, the object exploded with the force of an atomic blast equal to over 40 megatons,...

In 1908, villagers from a sparsely populated area of central Siberia, near the Tunguska River, witnessed a large glowing object streak across the sky. Suddenly, the object exploded with the force of an atomic blast equal to over 40 megatons, completely destroying miles of forest. Secrecy since the days of Stalin have kept the truth of this event hidden until now. Hear from one of the last living eyewitnesses of this event as well as a former KGB officer who describes the ensuing cover-up.

A tranquil campground in rural France is the backdrop for this erotic sizzler between beautiful teenager Camille and down on his luck ex con, Blaise. Fresh out of prison, Blaise accepts a job as sailing instructor at the camp. Haunted by violent...

A tranquil campground in rural France is the backdrop for this erotic sizzler between beautiful teenager Camille and down on his luck ex con, Blaise. Fresh out of prison, Blaise accepts a job as sailing instructor at the camp. Haunted by violent nightmares and reminded daily of his estranged wife and children, Blaise tries mightily to resist Camille's charms. But the girl's spontaneity and nubile sexuality awaken Blaise's own repressed capacity for life.

Sexual escapades with a parade of beautiful women distract American author Joe in this adaptation of Henry Miller's autobiographical novel. An aspiring American author travels to Paris for work. While there he befriends a Polish expat. The two...

Sexual escapades with a parade of beautiful women distract American author Joe in this adaptation of Henry Miller's autobiographical novel. An aspiring American author travels to Paris for work. While there he befriends a Polish expat. The two explore the cities restaurants and brothels. Directed by noted French auteur Claude Chabrol and starring Mannequin's Andrew McCarthy?!

Kip Polyard suffers from obsessive-compulsive disorder and hasn't left his rent-controlled Manhattan apartment in 10 months. When Celine, a beautiful young woman, moves in next door, Kip finds himself in an unlikely romance. But trouble arrives...

Kip Polyard suffers from obsessive-compulsive disorder and hasn't left his rent-controlled Manhattan apartment in 10 months. When Celine, a beautiful young woman, moves in next door, Kip finds himself in an unlikely romance. But trouble arrives in paradise when Celine's ex-boyfriend Andy shows up. Can Kip and Celine's burgeoning romance survive Andy's anger and jealousy? And is Celine harboring a secret of her own?
A bored young wife finds her life transformed after a torrid affair. Suffocated by a life with her meek husband and domineering mother-in-law, Katya starts a deadly liaison with the intense Sergei.
A bored young wife finds her life transformed after a torrid affair. Suffocated by a life with her meek husband and domineering mother-in-law, Katya starts a deadly liaison with the intense Sergei.

Bruno finds himself in a sticky situation when he sleeps with his ex-girlfriend on the day he moves in with his new one. Bruno thought he was really over Mia when he moved in with his new girlfriend, Camille. But when his ex shows up at the...

Bruno finds himself in a sticky situation when he sleeps with his ex-girlfriend on the day he moves in with his new one. Bruno thought he was really over Mia when he moved in with his new girlfriend, Camille. But when his ex shows up at the apartment and seduces him, he can't resist her charms. Now he has to cover up his infidelity before Camille gets home. There's just one problem: he and Mia are stuck to each other.

The classic punk rock movie from 1980 starring Richard Hell, illustrating the end of the first wave of New York City punk rock. Nada (Carole Bouquet), a beautiful French journalist on assignment in New York, records the life and work of up and...

The classic punk rock movie from 1980 starring Richard Hell, illustrating the end of the first wave of New York City punk rock. Nada (Carole Bouquet), a beautiful French journalist on assignment in New York, records the life and work of up and coming punk rock star, Billy (Richard Hell). Featuring members of the Voidoids and the Ramones. A time capsule from '80's New York City.

Forbidden love and attempted suicide frame this lurid slice of erotic body horror, acting out like the sick child of Genet, Cronenberg, and De Palma. Lucille's about to turn eighteen and longs to study poetry, but her surgeon father insists the...

Forbidden love and attempted suicide frame this lurid slice of erotic body horror, acting out like the sick child of Genet, Cronenberg, and De Palma. Lucille's about to turn eighteen and longs to study poetry, but her surgeon father insists the sciences are the way to go. When a failed suicide leaves her with hideous burns to her face, her father hires a sultry nurse to look after Lucille, but spending 24 hours together leads patient and nurse to discover passionate feelings for each other.
A crew finds horrific truths in the demonic hills where three rock climbers disappeared, all as cameras roll.
A crew finds horrific truths in the demonic hills where three rock climbers disappeared, all as cameras roll.
A controversial romance begins when a teenage boy develops a crush on a thirty-year-old woman. At first it's a game of seduction; then turmoil sets in, followed by desire and perhaps, love.
A controversial romance begins when a teenage boy develops a crush on a thirty-year-old woman. At first it's a game of seduction; then turmoil sets in, followed by desire and perhaps, love.
Four teens discover the pain and excitement of emerging sexuality while playing a harmless children's game.
Four teens discover the pain and excitement of emerging sexuality while playing a harmless children's game.
A dying boxer offers citizenship to a young Vietnamese girl in exchange for having his child. Well acclaimed at international festival circuit, for both the raw emotional story and the honest acting.
A dying boxer offers citizenship to a young Vietnamese girl in exchange for having his child. Well acclaimed at international festival circuit, for both the raw emotional story and the honest acting.
A young couple trapped in a remote estate of empty houses and shrieking foxes are beckoned from their isolation into a twilight world--a world of the paranormal, or perhaps insanity.
A young couple trapped in a remote estate of empty houses and shrieking foxes are beckoned from their isolation into a twilight world--a world of the paranormal, or perhaps insanity.

A gripping and emotionally charged fantasy! After losing her boyfriend in an accident, Armelle grows delusional with sights of her lover. As her mania deepens, Armelle is driven to the limits of reason to reconnect with her deceased boyfriend.

A gripping and emotionally charged fantasy! After losing her boyfriend in an accident, Armelle grows delusional with sights of her lover. As her mania deepens, Armelle is driven to the limits of reason to reconnect with her deceased boyfriend.

The life of 20-year-old Nico from upper class Zurich is all party, sex and drugs when she meets Paco, the front man of a rap band. She finds herself drawn to his independent, creative and profound way of life, so different from her own. With...

The life of 20-year-old Nico from upper class Zurich is all party, sex and drugs when she meets Paco, the front man of a rap band. She finds herself drawn to his independent, creative and profound way of life, so different from her own. With naivet and infinite self-confidence, she tries to adopt his lifestyle - without anticipating the consequences.

A violently dark zombie comedy that won the Best French Short Film award at the 2012 Paris Fantastic International Film Festival. Dennis Mitchell, a Vietnam veteran, has seen it all: war, the subprime crisis and now zombies! In a video bulletin,...

A violently dark zombie comedy that won the Best French Short Film award at the 2012 Paris Fantastic International Film Festival. Dennis Mitchell, a Vietnam veteran, has seen it all: war, the subprime crisis and now zombies! In a video bulletin, Dennis instructs us in the fine art of zombie extermination, be they the standard issue unemployed zombies, or the reviled zombie bankers.

Sexina is the world's hottest teen pop star, but she's also a secret crime-fighting detective battling evils in the music industry. When she discovers a missing scientist has been forced to create cyborg bands for "The Boss" of Glitz Records (TV...

Sexina is the world's hottest teen pop star, but she's also a secret crime-fighting detective battling evils in the music industry. When she discovers a missing scientist has been forced to create cyborg bands for "The Boss" of Glitz Records (TV Batman's Adam West), the fists and power ballads fly!

There are more than 100 billion fire ants on earth. They swarm in seconds, attack in the thousands, and kill within minutes. When a breed of fire ants are discovered in Texas, residents find a solution to get rid of the flesh eating insects....

There are more than 100 billion fire ants on earth. They swarm in seconds, attack in the thousands, and kill within minutes. When a breed of fire ants are discovered in Texas, residents find a solution to get rid of the flesh eating insects. Nothing spells trouble like love, greed and fire ants getting mixed up down and dirty in rural Texas!

After a global pandemic wipes out Earth's adult population, sisters Evie and Fran must forage for life in a world gone LORD OF THE FLIES. Scavenging across Ireland, their only possession an old children's book, the two have managed to sustain a...

After a global pandemic wipes out Earth's adult population, sisters Evie and Fran must forage for life in a world gone LORD OF THE FLIES. Scavenging across Ireland, their only possession an old children's book, the two have managed to sustain a life of quiet survival. When their supplies are stolen by a ruthless gang, however, they're forced to confront the true savagery of this brave new world.

titles.title: Night Of The Living Dead: Reanimated

descriptions.description: A collaborative artistic mash-up of George Romero's cult classic featuring nearly 150 international artists and animators. See how each artist re-envisions their favorite scenes through their own artwork, with no restrictions on style, media or...

A collaborative artistic mash-up of George Romero's cult classic featuring nearly 150 international artists and animators. See how each artist re-envisions their favorite scenes through their own artwork, with no restrictions on style, media or process. The result is an eclectic 'art show' interpretation of the seminal 1968 film, boasting work ranging from oil paintings to comic illustrations and sock puppets to CGI and stop-motion, all placed over the original audio!

After an accident involving a touring hockey team and a date gone wrong, a group of youngsters find themselves stranded in the Welsh hills with a weird local and a mysterious American stranger. When attacked by stupefied flesh eating zombies they...

After an accident involving a touring hockey team and a date gone wrong, a group of youngsters find themselves stranded in the Welsh hills with a weird local and a mysterious American stranger. When attacked by stupefied flesh eating zombies they must pull together or no one will survive the night.

Shot at Paramount Studios on leftover sets in 1966, this cheesy Z-movie delivers everything you could hope for from its title. Legendary outlaw of the Old West Jesse James, on the run from Marshal MacPhee, hides out in the castle of Baron...

Shot at Paramount Studios on leftover sets in 1966, this cheesy Z-movie delivers everything you could hope for from its title. Legendary outlaw of the Old West Jesse James, on the run from Marshal MacPhee, hides out in the castle of Baron Frankenstein's granddaughter Maria, who proceeds to transform Jesse's slow-witted pal Hank into a bald zombie, which she names Igor.

B-movie legend Jim Wynorski - director of Cheerleader Massacre and countless more - continues his relentless output with this absurd creature feature. Set in an entirely unconvincing pastiche of 1950's small-town Americana, Gila! is a joyous...

B-movie legend Jim Wynorski - director of Cheerleader Massacre and countless more - continues his relentless output with this absurd creature feature. Set in an entirely unconvincing pastiche of 1950's small-town Americana, Gila! is a joyous tribute to bygone B-list movies with Z-list special effects. After a giant gila monster attacks a young couple on the outskirts of town, a community must rally together to rid itself of the reptilian menace.

The Goth Music doc you've been waiting for. Five years in the making, it features a killer soundtrack and interviews with the genre's top stars. Siouxsie Sioux and Voltaire are among the top Goth stars interviewed in this deep look at the music...

The Goth Music doc you've been waiting for. Five years in the making, it features a killer soundtrack and interviews with the genre's top stars. Siouxsie Sioux and Voltaire are among the top Goth stars interviewed in this deep look at the music scene in all its macabre and debauched, dark beauty. Five years in the making, the film looks at the scene past, present and future, and features a darkwave soundtrack to die for!

Stilted acting, bizarre choices, plastic props, and characters from the public domain! Must be an old-timey monster mash-up movie. Dracula travels to the American West, intent on making a beautiful ranch owner his next victim. However, when her...

Stilted acting, bizarre choices, plastic props, and characters from the public domain! Must be an old-timey monster mash-up movie. Dracula travels to the American West, intent on making a beautiful ranch owner his next victim. However, when her fiance, the legendary outlaw and gunslinger Billy the Kid, finds out about the plan, he rushes to her rescue. What follows is a (clumsy and kind of embarrassing) battle for the ages!

Se-young is the new girl in the office, and a fast target for her bullying supervisor, Lee-sun. With Lee-sun's harassment becoming a regular occurrence, Se-young finally snaps back with a threat one day. In this threat, however, Lee-sun senses a...

Se-young is the new girl in the office, and a fast target for her bullying supervisor, Lee-sun. With Lee-sun's harassment becoming a regular occurrence, Se-young finally snaps back with a threat one day. In this threat, however, Lee-sun senses a darker promise beyond the woman simply standing up for herself. Digging into Se-young's past, Lee-sun uncovers a sinister history of retribution, with misfortune befalling anyone who's ever crossed Se-Young's path. What wickedness could this woman...

Katie returns to her hometown after her grandmother dies, hoping to catch up with old friends. Instead she stumbles into a waking nightmare. Katie and her friends meet up and settle down in her grandmother's old house for a candlelit night of...

Katie returns to her hometown after her grandmother dies, hoping to catch up with old friends. Instead she stumbles into a waking nightmare. Katie and her friends meet up and settle down in her grandmother's old house for a candlelit night of drinking and sharing memories. But they soon realize some memories weren't meant to be unearthed. Trapped, Katie and her friends are left wondering, who will survive the night in this terrifying horror thriller.

A young woman investigating her sister's suicide by posing as a student at an all-girls school quickly learns it is a front for a satanic cult. "Satan's School for Girls" is a haven for nasty necromancers and pernicious pupils called "The Five,"...

A young woman investigating her sister's suicide by posing as a student at an all-girls school quickly learns it is a front for a satanic cult. "Satan's School for Girls" is a haven for nasty necromancers and pernicious pupils called "The Five," a group who loves to play with the Devil! It also has the lovely Kate Jackson and Cheryl Ladd, before they became two of "Charlie's Angels."

A dark and terrifying journey through the psyche of a lonely musician on a dangerous drug trip. A lonely musician takes a living drug and winds up on a psychedelic trip to a mysterious island he won't soon forget. Terrifying and claustrophobic,...

A dark and terrifying journey through the psyche of a lonely musician on a dangerous drug trip. A lonely musician takes a living drug and winds up on a psychedelic trip to a mysterious island he won't soon forget. Terrifying and claustrophobic, the film was an official selection at both the Off and Fantasia international film festivals. Hailed by the Atlantic Film Festival as echoing - sometimes surpassing - Lynch and Bunuel.

Artist Jiajia promises to show her friend Wei Ling around in Japan but mysteriously disappears. Stuck in Japan, Wei Ling gets accomodated in a family run hot-spring hotel with Jiajia's Japanese boyfriend, Shimizu, where she begins an excruciating...

Artist Jiajia promises to show her friend Wei Ling around in Japan but mysteriously disappears. Stuck in Japan, Wei Ling gets accomodated in a family run hot-spring hotel with Jiajia's Japanese boyfriend, Shimizu, where she begins an excruciating odyssey of hauntings and homicides, in which the victims are all family members of Shimizu.

Girls are disappearing in the woods. A brave mother confronts the horrors of the forest in search of her daughter in this atmospheric thriller. Mana's seven year old daughter Sakura has vanished without a trace, in the deep of a forest....

Girls are disappearing in the woods. A brave mother confronts the horrors of the forest in search of her daughter in this atmospheric thriller. Mana's seven year old daughter Sakura has vanished without a trace, in the deep of a forest. Meanwhile, teenage Mayu is kidnapped from a video store. Slowly, the pieces of the disturbing truth behind the forest begin coming together.

A chance encounter between two lost souls turns to violence when they become entwined in a twisted form of therapy in which innocent people will die. Alice, a lonely girl from the city, wanders the countryside with a dark secret. She is taken...

A chance encounter between two lost souls turns to violence when they become entwined in a twisted form of therapy in which innocent people will die. Alice, a lonely girl from the city, wanders the countryside with a dark secret. She is taken hostage by Edward, a deeply troubled outsider who is determined to pull her into a horrifying nightmare he is trying to create. Desperate to escape, Alice fights to free herself from his oppressive grasp, before they embark on a harrowing journey together.

A fun getaway turns into a journey to Hell for some teenage girls visiting an isolated house to rehearse a play for their private movie club. Shortly after they arrive, a videotape is found with footage of a killer wearing a Japanese "deigan"...

A fun getaway turns into a journey to Hell for some teenage girls visiting an isolated house to rehearse a play for their private movie club. Shortly after they arrive, a videotape is found with footage of a killer wearing a Japanese "deigan" mask. Is this footage real or fake? Soon, their food and equipment disappears and one of the girls is haunted by ghostly visions of the masked demon. Someone or something is in the house, and gruesome death awaits those who cannot escape!

One night, while he is alone in his apartment, the recently single Peter hears a knock at the door. His life will never be the same again. David Lynch by way of The Texas Chainsaw Massacre filtered through the domestic social realism of Dublin,...

One night, while he is alone in his apartment, the recently single Peter hears a knock at the door. His life will never be the same again. David Lynch by way of The Texas Chainsaw Massacre filtered through the domestic social realism of Dublin, Tin Can Man is unlike anything you've ever seen before!

We're introduced to the Tokyo Playboy Club when Katsutoshi goes there to hide out after a fight at work. Unfortunately, his idea of lying low involves losing his temper and beating the crap out of a gangster, sparking a conflict of escalating...

We're introduced to the Tokyo Playboy Club when Katsutoshi goes there to hide out after a fight at work. Unfortunately, his idea of lying low involves losing his temper and beating the crap out of a gangster, sparking a conflict of escalating violence and bloodshed. The result is a hilariously bleak satire as sharp as a shattered bottle.

Visually stunning, bursting with action, desire and sexual tension, this is the mad journey of a rebellious princess who falls from grace and is forced to work at a brothel. A seductive adaptation of the classic kabuki play, PRINCESS SAKURA...

Visually stunning, bursting with action, desire and sexual tension, this is the mad journey of a rebellious princess who falls from grace and is forced to work at a brothel. A seductive adaptation of the classic kabuki play, PRINCESS SAKURA follows the willful princess as she takes up work at a brothel in the hopes of meeting the man she fell in love with the night he assaulted her. Meanwhile, that man is himself on the run from assassins after his theft of a precious scroll.

Kazu and Machiko attempt to begin a life together in Kazu's home town. However, his family is unwilling to recognize the relationship. Machiko returns to Tokyo and Kazu soon follows her there to profess his love for her once and for all....

Kazu and Machiko attempt to begin a life together in Kazu's home town. However, his family is unwilling to recognize the relationship. Machiko returns to Tokyo and Kazu soon follows her there to profess his love for her once and for all. Meanwhile, the huge debt he's racked up with a dangerous loan shark named Yamahata becomes a threat to their relationship when Yamahata offers to cancel it out in exchange for Machiko

In a twisted tale of infidelity, a best-selling author fuels his latest novel with details drawn from his torrid affair with a female college student. His wife, reading the novel, strays deeper into mania.

In a twisted tale of infidelity, a best-selling author fuels his latest novel with details drawn from his torrid affair with a female college student. His wife, reading the novel, strays deeper into mania.

An apocalyptic tale that is a return to the trippy, socially-engaged, blackly comic, ridiculously violent revolutionary movies of Japan's 60's. A high school student has a vision that the world is ending and so, faced with no consequences, he...

An apocalyptic tale that is a return to the trippy, socially-engaged, blackly comic, ridiculously violent revolutionary movies of Japan's 60's. A high school student has a vision that the world is ending and so, faced with no consequences, he abducts a fellow student and goes on a crime spree. Based on Naoki Yamamoto's cult manga, Eiji Uchida's Last Days of the World is a teenage nihilist's pop-psychological mixtape spilled onto celluloid in the dirtiest, dreamiest way possible.

Directed by 2008 Academy Award Winner Yojiro Takita (Departures), Groper Train: Wedding Capriccio is a mind-bending and comedic, sex-filled ride! The world's greatest detective, Ippei Kuroda, is hired to find a man's estranged daughter. When...

Directed by 2008 Academy Award Winner Yojiro Takita (Departures), Groper Train: Wedding Capriccio is a mind-bending and comedic, sex-filled ride! The world's greatest detective, Ippei Kuroda, is hired to find a man's estranged daughter. When she's is found dead, the mystery deepens. Meanwhile, Kuroda's assistant tries to stop her arranged marriage to a country hick by shacking-up with a composer who writes symphonies on his calculator - when he's not groping women on the Tokyo trains!

Honeymoon explores modern Japanese society through the prism of sexploitation and reality TV. Welcome to the absurd world of Paradise TV, Tokyo's 24 hour-a-day interactive sex channel. Exploring modern Japanese society through the prism of...

Honeymoon explores modern Japanese society through the prism of sexploitation and reality TV. Welcome to the absurd world of Paradise TV, Tokyo's 24 hour-a-day interactive sex channel. Exploring modern Japanese society through the prism of reality TV, Honeymoon presents a unique cultural viewpoint, successfully mixing the European cinematic experience with an American rock video mentality, all blended by severe Asian influences.

A teenage rock musician masturbates gleefully and often. Way too often. One night, flying sperm escape and impregnate local women. The babies grow into an army of little creatures with the teen's head -- and libido. An outrageous tale of orgasmic...

A teenage rock musician masturbates gleefully and often. Way too often. One night, flying sperm escape and impregnate local women. The babies grow into an army of little creatures with the teen's head -- and libido. An outrageous tale of orgasmic proportions, this film follows the consequences of one man's overly-enthusiastic habit of pleasuring himself.

Maria, a robot, came to Ueno's house while he was young. After his parents die, a grown up Ueno experiments with Maria for his own fantasies. Maria was once brought into Ueno's home to take care of him as he grew up. As an adult, though, Ueno...

Maria, a robot, came to Ueno's house while he was young. After his parents die, a grown up Ueno experiments with Maria for his own fantasies. Maria was once brought into Ueno's home to take care of him as he grew up. As an adult, though, Ueno falls for her, wishing to fulfill his dreams of their passion. But even the most powerful robots have battery lives.

Experience two erotic tales of survival. In "The Hunger," a suicidal woman ventures into the woods intending to take her own life. "The Hidden," a young woman who is taking a shower as a stranger who bears a striking resemblance to her boyfriend...

Experience two erotic tales of survival. In "The Hunger," a suicidal woman ventures into the woods intending to take her own life. "The Hidden," a young woman who is taking a shower as a stranger who bears a striking resemblance to her boyfriend appears.
A seemingly demure editor with a dark secret starts a steamy liaison with her coworker, leading the couple into a secret world of predatory sexual attraction.
A seemingly demure editor with a dark secret starts a steamy liaison with her coworker, leading the couple into a secret world of predatory sexual attraction.

Three troublesome noble-born friends with no interest in their Confucian studies are thrilled when girls are accepted to study with boys at school. One day, two of the boys get abducted and laid by a mysterious woman at a secluded windmill....

Three troublesome noble-born friends with no interest in their Confucian studies are thrilled when girls are accepted to study with boys at school. One day, two of the boys get abducted and laid by a mysterious woman at a secluded windmill. Though initially elated by this turn of events, the boys are shamed when the woman leaves them to be found tied up in ropes the next day. Unable to tolerate their shameful experience, the three begin to investigate the identity of the mysterious abductress.

Exploring the intersection between love and art, this same-sex Korean romance centers on an art professor's wistful recollections of her affair with a relationship-phobic drifter, a story she relays to two of her students.

Exploring the intersection between love and art, this same-sex Korean romance centers on an art professor's wistful recollections of her affair with a relationship-phobic drifter, a story she relays to two of her students.

A Horror mockumentary staring J-idol group, Momoiro Clover. The girls visit a haunted school for a TV special. Little do they know their secret wishes are then granted with soul snatching consequences.

A Horror mockumentary staring J-idol group, Momoiro Clover. The girls visit a haunted school for a TV special. Little do they know their secret wishes are then granted with soul snatching consequences.

Based on actual historical accounts, this sword and sandal epic retells the forgotten story of when Caesar went up against a vicious gang of pirates. Julius Caesar flees Rome because of a conspiracy against him and takes refuge with the King of...

Based on actual historical accounts, this sword and sandal epic retells the forgotten story of when Caesar went up against a vicious gang of pirates. Julius Caesar flees Rome because of a conspiracy against him and takes refuge with the King of Bitinia. He finds a woman there, and while he escorts her to Rhodes, their ship is attacked. Caught by the pirates, he asks for help to get back to Rome.
An inside look at the gritty streets of Brazil.
An inside look at the gritty streets of Brazil.

Even today, the geisha epitomize the beauty of Japan's past. But theirs is a dying profession beneath the neon glare of Tokyo and Japan's modernity. Drawing on interviews with the world-renowned Mineko Iwasaki and other geisha, this program...

Even today, the geisha epitomize the beauty of Japan's past. But theirs is a dying profession beneath the neon glare of Tokyo and Japan's modernity. Drawing on interviews with the world-renowned Mineko Iwasaki and other geisha, this program places the geisha in the context of contemporary Japan. In addition to background on the geisha mystique, the program dispels the distorted image of geisha as courtesan and illustrates their efforts to retain their significance while adapting to a new world.

titles.title: The Secret of the Egyptian Pyramids

descriptions.description: Why do the Pyramids of Giza have no mummies inside? Why was a mighty warship found inside a Great Pyramid? The questions are mind-boggling. Just wait for the shocking answers, revealed in THE SECRET OF THE EGYPTIAN PYRAMIDS.

Why do the Pyramids of Giza have no mummies inside? Why was a mighty warship found inside a Great Pyramid? The questions are mind-boggling. Just wait for the shocking answers, revealed in THE SECRET OF THE EGYPTIAN PYRAMIDS.

titles.title: Atlantis: Secret Star Mappers of a Lost World

descriptions.description: Go beyond the lost human history! Examine recent discoveries of an advanced human settlement that submerged when sea levels rose after the Ice Age. Learn the shocking and exciting new evidence which is making some believe the story of Atlantis...

Go beyond the lost human history! Examine recent discoveries of an advanced human settlement that submerged when sea levels rose after the Ice Age. Learn the shocking and exciting new evidence which is making some believe the story of Atlantis has its roots in actual historical events!

titles.title: Le Moulin Rouge: The Cabaret of Life

descriptions.description: A naughty inside look into the world's most famous cabaret! The costumes, the dancing, the girls, make this venue the ultimate late night destination for jetsetters, artists, politicians and tourists alike.

A naughty inside look into the world's most famous cabaret! The costumes, the dancing, the girls, make this venue the ultimate late night destination for jetsetters, artists, politicians and tourists alike.

titles.title: Hated: GG Allin & the Murder Junkies

descriptions.description: The legendary documentary featuring the most detailed and intimate footage the world will ever see of GG. From filmmaker Todd Phillips, who would go on to direct The Hangover, this 120 minute documentary includes concert footage, birthday party,...

The legendary documentary featuring the most detailed and intimate footage the world will ever see of GG. From filmmaker Todd Phillips, who would go on to direct The Hangover, this 120 minute documentary includes concert footage, birthday party, & funeral.

The story of the death and subsequent cover-up of cosmonaut Vladimir Komarov during the first flight of the Soyuz spacecraft. With never-before-heard interviews and shocking footage, this bold documentary sets out to uncover the truth behind the...

The story of the death and subsequent cover-up of cosmonaut Vladimir Komarov during the first flight of the Soyuz spacecraft. With never-before-heard interviews and shocking footage, this bold documentary sets out to uncover the truth behind the conspiracy of the Phantom Cosmonauts.
This doc takes an insider's look into how Russia's number one export is manufactured and find out why the AK still remains a legendary weapon in Russian history.
This doc takes an insider's look into how Russia's number one export is manufactured and find out why the AK still remains a legendary weapon in Russian history.

In under an hour, this doc brings zine culture to life! With his broken and borrowed equipment, Joe Biel illuminates the world of self-publishing. He gives us glimpses of the Portland Zine Symposium, takes us on a a zine-themed bicycle tour...

In under an hour, this doc brings zine culture to life! With his broken and borrowed equipment, Joe Biel illuminates the world of self-publishing. He gives us glimpses of the Portland Zine Symposium, takes us on a a zine-themed bicycle tour around Portland, and interviews local zinesters. The documentary answers a wide array of questions, including: what are zines, why do people make zines, where did zines come from, how do zine communities function, and what does the future hold for zines?

A documentary, filmed over 3 years, following four young girls who sell souvenirs and search for husbands on the streets of a remote Vietnamese town. When Shalom Almond visited Sapa as a tourist, she became friends with four savvy, street smart...

A documentary, filmed over 3 years, following four young girls who sell souvenirs and search for husbands on the streets of a remote Vietnamese town. When Shalom Almond visited Sapa as a tourist, she became friends with four savvy, street smart Hmong girls dreaming of a life beyond selling souvenirs. But how will these young girls survive the leap from remote tribal culture to 21st century Asia? Over the next three years, Shalom returned to Vietnam with her camera to find out.

An unfettered study of the penis's place in history, art, religion, and contemporary life. Does size really matter? Is the male organ simply a tool for sex, or is it a phallic symbol worthy of deification? To what extent is men's preoccupation...

An unfettered study of the penis's place in history, art, religion, and contemporary life. Does size really matter? Is the male organ simply a tool for sex, or is it a phallic symbol worthy of deification? To what extent is men's preoccupation with their penises responsible for the aggressive, militaristic, and violent nature of our society? These are some of the questions that this film covers.

Step into the lives of the courtesans, the smart, desired women who rose above their station to exert great power from the bedrooms of Paris society. In an era when men unquestionably dominated the spheres of business and government, intelligent,...

Step into the lives of the courtesans, the smart, desired women who rose above their station to exert great power from the bedrooms of Paris society. In an era when men unquestionably dominated the spheres of business and government, intelligent, desirable courtesans were able to rise above the restrictions placed on conventional women. Watch as they revel in their exceptional status as the most sought-after creatures in that curious shadow society known as the "demimonde."

titles.title: Scary and Deadly Incidents in Space

descriptions.description: A harsh look at the pioneers who face unforgiving hostile environments and endless life threatening pressures in the pursuit to conquer the unknown. In charting the mysterious expanse of space, both men and women pioneers risked their lives to...

A harsh look at the pioneers who face unforgiving hostile environments and endless life threatening pressures in the pursuit to conquer the unknown. In charting the mysterious expanse of space, both men and women pioneers risked their lives to further human kinds reach and influence. Some of these pioneer heroes never come back, while others experience explosions, catastrophe, and injury. This program seeks to shine a light on the true sacrifices made by those heroes.

The suburbs are a labyrinth. A man is stuck. There are many forks. Anxieties form. Friends become relative. Everyone is walking. Two men refuse coerced vision. Movement in still life. Retribution from the sky. Intermittent head trauma. What is...

The suburbs are a labyrinth. A man is stuck. There are many forks. Anxieties form. Friends become relative. Everyone is walking. Two men refuse coerced vision. Movement in still life. Retribution from the sky. Intermittent head trauma. What is that building? Where is uncle Jean? Who is the man from the DVD? Have you mowed the lawn? What is suburban zero? The dream ends here.
This is your chance to interact with us, see your pretty face streaming on Roku and win a Roku player and more gifts.
This is your chance to interact with us, see your pretty face streaming on Roku and win a Roku player and more gifts.
A ghost-hunting duo ventures into a notorious 18th century mansion to find its dark secrets. Was a sinister cult born there hundreds of years ago?
A ghost-hunting duo ventures into a notorious 18th century mansion to find its dark secrets. Was a sinister cult born there hundreds of years ago?
Join a group of ghost hunters as they enter a psychiatric hospital with a dark, haunted history. The disturbing truths of the past that they find are chronicled in this episode of DEAD CROSSROADS.
The home of an 18th-century family man with a horrific history is investigated by the Dead Crossroads ghost hunters. When they dare dare to sleep in the ancient attic, terrifiyng horror ensues.

In the 19th century, a man looking for his daughter murdered an entire orphanage. Now, the DEAD CROSSROADS ghost hunting team dares to revisit the disturbing site to face the vengeful ghosts it holds.
The DEAD CROSSROADS ghost hunters' investigation into an orphanage where a horrific massacre took place takes a chilling turn.

titles.title: The Tragic Fate of the Dubois Family

descriptions.description: Two ghost hunters visit a home where tragedy occurred: when an elderly couple died, their sons went missing. The visit turns disturbing when the hunters begin searching for paranormal activity.
The DEAD CROSSROADS ghost hunters spend a night in a haunting building tied to violence and paranormal disturbance, all linked back to the number 27. Their findings lead to chilling results.

A secret room in an ancient castle is home to chilling, ghostly findings for the Dead Crossroads team. When they dare to investigate the tragic death of a young girl hundreds of years ago, what will the team uncover?
The Dead Crossroads team must cope with the shocking discoveries they made in that room. Will they succeed in finding peace for the little girl in the castle?
To celebrate Halloween, the ghost hunters of DEAD CROSSROADS take on the ghost of Faustina Thieffray, one of the most notorious specters in French history.

In the season finale of DEAD CROSSROADS, the French ghost hunters take on their deadliest paranormal challenge yet, entering the cursed home of sinister ghost Faustina Thieffray once and for all... with horrifying results.

A military compound that was the site of two murders is featured in this episode of DEAD CROSSROADS. Two ghost hunters examine the dark history of the complex, but first, they must brave a slaughterhouse.
Blending the real and fictional, this intimate docudrama paints a unique portrait of a group of queer women living in Montreal.
Lea tries to leave dreams of love behind and have some fun.
Post-divorce Cline goes out on the town with friends in search of a good time.
Steph learns a lesson in love the hard way.
Nomie anxiously awaits her first time kissing a woman.
A passionate moment brings out reflection for two girl friends who might become something more.
milie is stuck on the streets, without even her trusty cat to turn to.
Passion, pain, and laughter are in store when a reunion brings the girlfriends together.
The girlfriends say their farewells and reflect on their lives and loves.
From the ghosts of iconic authors, to fortresses haunted by spectres of the afterlife, GHOST CASES is an immersive look at the world of the paranormal.

Paul and Holly visit St. Andrew's Jail - one of the oldest courthouses and jails in North America - as they investigate reports of a hooded specter and the possible spirit of an RAF Serviceman executed for murder in 1942.
Our experts investigate intense reports of paranormal activity at a private residence in a quaint town where the home owners now fear living in their own house.
Paul and Holly investigate the Fairmont Algonquin Resort to try and contact the ghost of a heartbroken bride in room 473.

Have you ever eaten with the dead? Our hosts visit a restaurant whose staff believe is haunted by the ghosts of a former funeral home. The location has an impressive history with ties to the passengers of the Titanic and the victims of infamous...
We explore a historic French fortress that witnessed two of the largest land and sea battles in North America. Many believe it is still inhabited by the ghosts of its past inhabitants.

The hosts join a group of UK paranormal detectives at a very paranormally active location. Some of the rooms of the White Hart Hotel are reported to be plagued by demonic activity while the ghost of a playful little boy is said to be seen all...
This episode investigates a 12th century property near the historic village of Shocklach, England. Reports from this location include time portals, full-bodied apparitions, light and sound anomalies.
Paul and Holly visit a historic Inn while staying in Congleton, England. It is believed that the ghost of a past owner may still haunt the cellar of the centuries old site.

Manchester Online is a popular internet radio station that has recently moved their station to a Victorian era home in Manchester, England that is said to be haunted. The new owners may have received more than they bargained for!

What would a paranormal investigation be without a visit to a quintessential haunted mansion? Churchill Mansion is a century old structure that may still possess the spirit of its influential owner and his troubled niece.

In this episode we investigate the private residence of a family that believes they still share their home with its former owner a wealthy sea captain and his family who has been deceased for decades.

Some guests have reportedly seen the ghost of Oscar Wilde who visited this historic Inn located in Halifax, Nova Scotia in the late 1800's. This segment explores these suspicions and uncovers the evidence.
The series wraps up with a recap of the best evidence that has been compiled along the way. Did Holly or Paul have the definitive experience that will change the way they thought about ghosts?

In an attempt to create a new race of perfect humans - a drug company unleashes what turns out to be a deadly virus. Now as thousands are killed in Moscow, it's up to 11 individuals to figure out the future of mankind.
Eleven strangers find themselves locked in a bunker with no recollection of what happened night before. As they try escape, a mad virus outbreak is taking over Moscow.
The kidnapping of Prof. Radomsky's daughter forces him back into working on the virus.
The military sets up a perimeter around Moscow using electric fencing, trapping everyone left in the city.
A guy wakes up in a bunker screaming for Marina - who is seeing mysterious signs on the wall not there before.
A mysterious man in uniform and mask enters the bunker covered in blood before collapsing on the ground.
Army troops search the underground in hopes to capture mutants for study. Things go sour when the squad finds itself outnumbered.

titles.title: Love in the Time of Plague

descriptions.description: The group is held captive by looters and Aizhan grows concerned over the wound on her arm.
A biologist pays an unexpected visit to the group and unveils the real perpetrator responsible for their kidnapping.
The bite inflicted by a mutant on Aizhan's arm deteriorates and the group sets off for Radomsky's lab.
The group is forced to make a decision after receiving a message from Pasha over the radio. Is it real or is it a trap?
The vaccine developed by Dr. Radomsky to inoculate victims against the virus has an unforeseen effect.

On the season finale, Radomsky reveals that the original intent of the experiment was to create a perfect, disease-free society. In the less than perfect reality they now face, the group has one last burden to bear before being released.
A documentary-drama hybrid featuring the nocturnal characters that populate Montreal's great urban outdoors. Hustlers, street performers, vampires - those 'out on the prowl' way past our bedtimes.
BUSKERS AND PAGANS takes a look at two sides of Montreal's nightlife: the performers who bring its streets alive and the rituals that go on when it gets dark.
The worlds of dominatrix photography, piercing rituals, and body painting events are chronicled in this episode of URBAN NITES.
STREET ART GURUS profiles a community of Montreal artists who come out at night to showcase their talents, and the gallery owner who could make one or two of them a star.
A crime photographer, a performance artist, and the reckless world of underground street racing are in the spotlight in this episode of URBAN NITES.
The lives of strip club "barkers," who work Montreal's sidewalks drumming up attnedance for strip clubs, is highlighted in this episode of URBAN NITES.
A series of Montreal artists who come out at night to paint the city in graffiti, and a man who entertains on a horse-drawn carriage, are the stars of this episode of URBAN NITES.
This episode of URBAN NITES features a group dedicated to cleaning Montreal's wildest streets after dark.
A fox demon gets caught in a web of romance, betrayal and magic with a human princess and her heroic lover.
Fox Spirit Xiaowei is sent to the Ice Hell for breaking the fox clan code. Madam Qing sends Cai to the underworld to save the spirit.
Wang Ying is sentenced to prison for a horrible accident.
Cai Que rescues Xiaowei out of the Ice Hell, but the fox spirit's struggle is only beginning.
Wang saves Xiaowei from a rogue, as passionate feelings begin to develop.
Li Jing goes to the frontier searching for Wang Ying. But first, she must escape a brutal army out for vengeance.
An assassination plot develops against a young prince.
Xiaowei is forced to keep her powers a secret as her feelings develop for Li Jing.
A murderous plot against Zheng Ji's mother takes a shocking turn.
A rescue mission builds to a powerful friendship.
Li Jing reflects on the passions and heartbreaks, the dreams and regrets, of her broken past.
Lao Yao makes a blood pact that could have violent consequences.
Will Valentine's Day heat up the passion between Wang and Li?
A spirit is haunting Xiaowei, and it's closer than she could ever imagine.
Xiaowei puts her life on the line to save Wang from death.
A fight breaks out over the heart of Pang Lang.
Li Jing fights off an unwanted marriage to a vicious barbarian.
Xiaowei's mysterious disappearance leads to heartbreak.
Wang is forced to return home to make a life or death exchange.
Zheng Ji voyages to a dangerous frontier filled with murderous bandits to save Li Jing.
Pang Lang begins to fall in love with Cai Que. Will she be able to give her heart?
Xiaowei and Fu Sheng face their differences.
Cai Que makes a life-changing decision.
Romantic tension and jealousy build as Wang looks after Li Jing.
When dead bodies start appearing in the barracks, Wang suspects an evil spirit is behind the murders.
Xiaowei's passion for Wang builds, as her hopes for true love grow dimmer.
Xiaowei is driven by her passions to brutal murder.
A Lian and Zheng Ji head on a dangerous adventure to hunt down murderous demons.
Zheng Ji returns to the Wan Gu Clan.
Wang begins finding the truth of Xiaowei's magical secret.
Xiaowei faces Madam Qing's betrayal.
A gift exchange reveals secrets of the heart.
A Lian's birthday turns from heartbreak to kindness.
Li Jing's scar leads her to hide away from the world.
Xiaowei and Li Jing face an uncertain future.
Madam Qing plots to kill Wang Ying for the life of Xiaowei.
Passions of the heart lead to a fight between Pang and A Lian.
Li Jing's wedding takes an ugly turn.
A tragedy forces Pang to change his life forever.
Zheng Ji blames A Lian for she has no faith in him.
Zheng Ji and Si Tu plot to take over the throne by any means necessary.
Passion and pain come to a head for the Wang/Xiaoshuai/Li love triangle.
